narration.scrollbar.horizontal.title: Horizontal scrollbar
narration.scrollbar.horizontal.usage.foc: Press LEFT or RIGHT to scroll
narration.scrollbar.horizontal.usage.hov: Use your horizontal scrolling to scroll, if you have one and are not on MacOS
narration.scrollbar.vertical.title: Vertical scrollbar
narration.scrollbar.vertical.usage.focus: Press UP or DOWN to scroll
narration.scrollbar.vertical.usage.hover: Use your scroll wheel to scroll
